summary: A mod editing Illia\'s combat AI and skills to make her more useful in combat. Also includes optional files to improve her equipment, appearance and race respectively.
descriptionHtml:
[center] [img] http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/22013-1-1344476091.jpg [/img]
[heading]Illia\'s Improved Combat AI[/heading] [/center]

I created this mod for three reasons. Firstly, while traveling with Illia, she\'d use up all her mana then charge whatever I was fighting to punch it in the face (promptly getting her face eaten). Secondly, whenever I tried to give her robes with better stats she\'d thank me and never wear them. And lastly, when I finally got her to remove that robe, she was so ugly I spat cornflakes on my screen. So I have included a wide variety optional files with this mod so that everyone can tailor Illia exactly to their tastes. Note that her AI will only change when she is a follower, she still fights the same during the quest \"Repentance\"

Combat Improvements
    *Illia still favors Ice magic and some Alteration spells but gains no skill in other schools
    *Illia now gains average skill in OneHanded and LightArmor
    *Illia gains 1 point in Sneak at every level so she can travel with stealth based characters
    *In combat, she will fire Ice Spikes at foes then enter close combat.
    *If she is at a high enough level, she will cast Ice Cloak before entering close combat
    *She will dual-wield one handed weapons, if given the chance

Optional Improvements Included
    *One file changes the default robes to the Hoodless Destruction Robes
    *One file removes all default clothing. She will wear anything you give her without trouble.
    *One file changes her race to Breton and updates her appearance
    *One file gives her a sexy voice (Warning: this makes her silent during her quest \"Repentance\")


Installation
Copy both files from the folder of your choice to the folder /skyrim/Data

Removal
Delete \"dunDarklightIllia.bsa\" and \"dunDarklightIllia.esp\" from /skyrim/Data

The base Mod requires no other mods to work

Appearance Mod\'s Required Mods
    *ApachiiSkyHair
    *Improved Freckles Skyrim

Optional Mods
    *CBBEv3

CONFLICTS
*this mod will conflict with or overwrite any other mods that change Illia.
*for some reason her face will sometimes turn black in the Bannered Mare
*changing Illia\'s voice will cause her to be silent during her quest \"Repentance\". You can advance and finish her quest without issue, however the conversations during this quest will be rather boring and you must be patient and wait for the conversation options change. I don\'t think it\'s possible to fix this as her lines were only recorded in one voice...
author: KisaFayd
